about_the_game:
The Die is Cast: Demo Version Overview

The Die is Cast fully integrates the combat experience and fun of exploration from dungeon crawlers into a turn-based roguelike game. In this demo, players can experience the first chapter of the game, offering a taste of the full adventure with limited classes, events, and dungeon levels.

Prepare to Choose Your Hero and Conquer the Dungeon

  • Four Classes: Warrior, Mage, Archer, and Rogue. Each class has its own unique traits and play styles, and each character within the class has different abilities.

  • Adventure is a choice between birth and death: Will you turn the tide by reviving fallen allies through mass resurrection, or will you leave no room for variables by raining down powerful meteors on your enemies? Every decision adds up and determines the success or failure of the adventure.

  • Various Events in the Dungeon: From monsters that greet your party at the start, to powerful traps that strike when you're momentarily relieved, to lucky treasure chests found in crisis - experience numerous events in the dungeon.

Great Risks Come with Great Rewards

  • Gold and Treasures!: Earn great rewards by seizing lucky opportunities or defeating strong enemies. Among these, high-quality equipment is a key reward that will make you smile!

  • Equipment-Centric Growth System: Equipment enhances your character's identity, and higher grades have powerful effects that can change the game.

  • The Wheel of Fate: In addition to equipment, various elements strengthen and grow your allies. Runes, artifacts, and numerous events await.

The Die is Cast: Demo now playable

Recruit allies, master skills, and use items to conquer the unknown dungeons. Adjust your strategy in real-time as you battle monsters and counter their tactics. Test your strength against the final boss waiting at the end of the dungeon!
